title: Can you help me report
body: Hi I just had a game that a couple of people on my team were quite salty and I reported them after the game but they decided to continue after the game and started to add the use of kys and f****t to there vocabulary is there a way that I could expand upon my report.

replies.body: You're off to a good start by using the after match lobby report feature! Make sure to fill out as much of it as possible and leave as much detail as you can to accurately report them. You can also post to the player behavior & moderation boards if you ever feel like you need to reach out to us further!
Thank you very much for the information
